flavor_text_entries.red:
During the day,
it keeps its face
buried in the ground. At night,
it wanders around
sowing its seeds.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
During the day,
it keeps its face
buried in the ground. At night,
it wanders around
sowing its seeds.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
It may be mistaken
for a clump of
weeds. If you try to yank it out of
the ground, it
shrieks horribly.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
Awakened by moon­
light, it roams 
actively at night. In the day, it
stays quietly
underground.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
If exposed to
moonlight, it
starts to move. It roams far and
wide at night to
scatter its seeds.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
During the day, it
stays in the cold
underground to avoid the sun.
It grows by bath­
ing in moonlight.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
During the daytime, ODDISH buries
itself in soil to absorb nutrients from 
the ground using its entire body. The more fertile the soil, the glossier
its leaves become.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
ODDISH searches for fertile, nutrient-
rich soil, then plants itself.
During the daytime, while it is planted, this POKéMON’s feet are thought to
change shape and become similar to
the roots of trees.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
This POKéMON grows by absorbing moonlight.
During the daytime, it buries itself in the
ground, leaving only its leaves exposed to
avoid detection by its enemies.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
Its scientific name is “Oddium Wanderus.”
At night, it is said to walk nearly 1,000
feet on its two roots.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
During the day, it keeps its face buried
in the ground. At night, it wanders around
sowing its seeds.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
It often plants its root feet in the
ground during the day and sows
seeds as it walks about at night.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
It often plants its root feet in the
ground during the day and sows
seeds as it walks about at night.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
It often plants its root feet in the
ground during the day and sows
seeds as it walks about at night.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
Awakened by moonlight, it roams
actively at night. In the day, it stays
quietly underground.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
If exposed to moonlight, it
starts to move. It roams far and
wide at night to scatter its seeds.
flavor_text_entries.black:
It often plants its root feet in the
ground during the day and sows
seeds as it walks about at night.

ground during the day and sows
seeds as it walks about at night.

flavor_text_entries.x:
During the day, it stays in the cold underground
to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.
flavor_text_entries.y:
Its scientific name is “Oddium Wanderus.” At night,
it is said to walk nearly 1,000 feet on its two roots.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
During the daytime, Oddish buries itself in soil to absorb
nutrients from the ground using its entire body.
The more fertile the soil, the glossier its leaves become.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Oddish searches for fertile, nutrient-rich soil, then plants itself.
During the daytime, while it is planted, this Pokémon’s feet
are thought to change shape and become similar to the roots
of trees.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:
It may be mistaken for a clump of weeds.
If you try to yank it out of the ground,
it shrieks horribly.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-eevee:

If you try to yank it out of the ground,
it shrieks horribly.

It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.
